body:
Also I’ll translate the last page in depth because it was very noice.  It won’t be as nice without the illustrations, but I still wanted to do it

70 and some years since we met... Today is our real parting (because she’d said she would leave but stayed with him). Had I accomplished good deeds during that time?

I hope I was able to do so for you.

Like you did for me.

Daughter: “Mom? Where’s dad?”
Mother: “...he went to a far away country, dear”
D: “Will I be able to see him again?”
M: “Not for a while. After a long, long time, after you’ve grown up, and even further”
Son: “Mom, let’s go. You’re going to go around to do good deeds, right?  I’ll help.”
M: “All right, let’s go”

@m1ch43l grave of the guy she had sex and lived with, i mean, you know the difference of elfs and humans lifespan. Just a guess as i cant understand jap.. And as i can tell the small darkelf is their offspring.

@DendyGamer only 2 found: This and one of kuroinu. 
btw, whose grave is it at the end?
TRANSLATION NEED!!! Dark elves without orcs, rape and other shit it's ultra rare
